pages.text: This mod adds back the Converter, Balloons, Purifying Water and it's many uses, along with some new content such as Purifying Tools and a way to grow ender pearls!

Along with the old features, Thingamajigs 2 Goodies adds a new chance-based block. It can reward players or trick them greatly. It shouldn't destroy terrain too much if you are unlucky. Also, a fun note, it physically moves; the higher the move count, the better reward you'll get!
Balance and stability are the focus with this mod, so enjoy the features as they are.
Can be downloaded from the usual websites that Thingamajigs is from.
